
---------------------------------
Example

-n-

r1 x1 y1 z1

r2 x2 y2 z2  

r3 x3 y3 z3

n - number limit
ra - repetitions
xa - primes from sieve
ya - primes from MR
za - runtime (ss.s)
---------------------------------

-10-

2 4 4 0

3 4 4 0

10 4 4 0

-25-

2 9 9 0

3 9 9 0

10 9 9 0

-100-

2 25 25 0

3 25 25 0

10 25 25 0

-250-

2 53 53 0

3 53 53 0

10 53 53 0

-1000-

2 168 170 0

3 168 168 0

10 168 168 0

-2500-

2 367 368 0

3 367 368 0

10 367 367 0.01

-5000-

2 669 675 0.01

3 669 673 0.01

10 669 669 0.01

-10000-

2 1229 1236 0.03

3 1229 1233 0.03

10 1229 1232 0.03

-25000-

2 2762 2768 0.07

3 2762 2766 0.07

10 2762 2765 0.08

-50000-

2 5133 5141 0.15

3 5133 5136 0.13

10 5133 5138 0.14

-100000-

2 9592 9600 0.28

3 9592 9599 0.29

10 9592 9597 0.28

-250000-

2 22044 22057 0.73

3 22044 22055 0.66

10 22044 22054 0.72

-500000-

2 41538 41558 01.34

3 41538 41557 01.38

10 41538 41553 01.49

-1000000-

2 78498 78518 02.72

3 78498 78521 02.69

10 78498 78519 02.78

-2500000-

2 183072 183118 06.83

3 183072 183105 07.05

10 183072 183100 07.35

-5000000-

2 348513 348563 14.10

-10000000-

2 664579 664639 28.46
